blueprint.getCustomerByEmail: select id, name, address, email, phone, is_active from customer where email = @email
blueprint.getCustomersByName: select id, name, address, email, phone, is_active from customer where name = @name
blueprint.getCustomerByNameAndPhone: select id, name, address, email, phone, is_active from customer where name = @name and phone = @phone
blueprint.getCustomers: select id,name,address, email, phone, is_active from customer
